mentions.context: We used HEMNMA-3D open-source software, a plugin called ContinuousFlex [2], [3] for Scipion [11].
We used HEMNMA-3D open-source software, a plugin called ContinuousFlex [2], [3] for Scipion [11].
The clustering was done into 10 classes (k=10) based on the first two principal axes, using the k-means module of Scikit-Learn.
The hierarchical clustering on 1-CCC ij matrix was performed to 10 classes using the Agglomerative Clustering module of Python Scikit-Learn package [10].
